summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Capital Diligence page. All core requirements met including proper routing, content structure, memo-like tone, and responsive design. Page successfully loads at /capital-diligence with all 7 required sections present.
passed_tests: Subtitle mentions investors and structural analysis
All 7 sections present with correct titles and data-testids
Closing statement found and properly formatted
Request Context link text and navigation working
High whitespace and slow reading rhythm implemented
Responsive design works on mobile and tablet
No inappropriate use of prohibited terms (scoring, checklists, promises, metrics)
Terms 'scores', 'rankings', 'metrics' used only in acceptable negative contexts
